detour.phonetic: No service to SW Pacific Highway & 78th due to construction. Use stops before or after.

detour.phonetic: For trips to Portland City Center, no service to SW Barbur at Luradel due to construction. Use next stop at Huber St .

detour.phonetic: The southbound stop on SW Barbur at Capitol Hill Rd. is closed. Use stop at Evans or a temporary stop at 21st.
